metadata.name: Sweet Like Honey
metadata.description:
Love always resembles the sweetest of substances, and love is always sweet like Honey.

This digital transformative artwork is inspired by the 1980s era of vintage VHS cassette tape covers, often seen to resemble horror movies from the past, 
but this piece has a modern romantic twist!

LOVE OR LUST COLLECTION.

Created & Directed by Bradley Varndell. 2022.
